name: microwave-rails
tagline: no more fussing with configuration -- just ready, set, Rails!
body:
# What you get out of this Microwave
* Ruby 2.2 & Rails 4.2
* Postgres
* Puma Webserver
* Ubuntu 14.04 Vagrant box
* provisioned using Chef / Test Kitchen / Berkshelf
* optimized for deployment to Heroku
* cross-platform-compatible (yes, Windows users rejoice!)

## Authors
Copyright 2015 Valerie Roske (@valerie-roske).
